aspecttable.name: SE TSFS 2010
aspecttable.reference: JTF rule book for Swedish Railroad described in the September 2009 version of the "3H Signaling System", Module 3H.

aspect.name: Not used
aspect.indication: The signal can be ignored.
aspect.description: Dark signal

aspect.name: Lit
aspect.indication: The signal must not be passed without permission from the traffic control.
aspect.description: Lit stop signal

aspect.name: Expect Stop
aspect.indication: Expect stop, prepare to stop at next main signal.
aspect.description: One flashing green light

aspect.name: Stop
aspect.indication: The signal must not be passed without permission from the traffic control. During shunting operations permission to pass a home signal displaying stop may be given with a radio or with a dwarf signal.
aspect.description: One red light on main signal

aspect.name: Stop and Sh0
aspect.indication: The signal must not be passed without permission from the traffic control. During shunting operations permission to pass a home signal displaying stop may be given with a radio or with a dwarf signal. Movement not allowed
aspect.description: One red light on main signal, Two horizontal white lights

aspect.name: Sh0
aspect.indication: Movement not allowed
aspect.description: Two horizontal white lights

aspect.name: Expect 40
aspect.indication: Expect slow, prepare to proceed at slow speed at next main signal (40 km/h if not indicated otherwise).
aspect.description: Two flashing green lights

aspect.name: Clear 40
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 40 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system.
aspect.description: Two green light on main signal, Left green light on main dwarf signal

aspect.name: Clear 40 Caution
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 40 km/h (25 mph) or at a higher speed given by the ATC system. The next signal might be displaying stop if it is farther away than 450 meters, so the driver must approach next signal cautiously and be prepared to stop short of next signal.
aspect.description: Left flashing green light on main dwarf signal

aspect.name: Clear 40 Short Entry Route
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at a maximum speed of 40 km/h (25 mph). The next signal shows "stop" and is closer than 450 meters.
aspect.description: Three green lights on main signal

aspect.name: Expect 80
aspect.indication: Expect proceed, prepare to proceed at next main signal (80 km/h if not indicated otherwise).
aspect.description: One flashing white light

aspect.name: Clear 80
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 80 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system.
aspect.description: One green light on main signal, Right green light on main dwarf signal

aspect.name: Clear 80 Caution
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 80 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system.
aspect.description: Right flashing green light on main dwarf signal

aspect.name: Clear 80 Expect Stop
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 80 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system. The next signal is displaying stop, so the driver must decrease speed and approach the next signal prepared to stop short of it.
aspect.description: One green light + one flashing green light on main signal

aspect.name: Clear 80 Expect 40
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 80 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system. The next signal is displaying clear 40, so the driver must decrease speed and approach the next signal prepared to pass it at a speed not exceeding 40 km/h (25 mph) or the speed shown on the ATC driver's display.
aspect.description: One green light + Two flashing green lights on main signal

aspect.name: Clear 80 Expect 80
aspect.indication: Authorises the driver to pass the signal at 80 km/h or at a higher speed given by the ATC system. The next signal is displaying a clear 80 aspect.
aspect.description: One green light + one flashing white light on main signal

aspect.name: Unlit
aspect.indication: The signal can be ignored.
aspect.description: Dark stop signal

aspect.name: Stop and Sh1
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, line clear
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged vertically

aspect.name: Sh1 Stop
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, line clear
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged vertically
aspect.comment: Movement allowed, clear and next main signal in Stop

aspect.name: Sh1 40
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, line clear
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged vertically
aspect.comment: Movement allowed, clear and next main signal in Proceed 40

aspect.name: Sh1 80
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, line clear
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged vertically
aspect.comment: Movement allowed, clear and next main signal in Proceed 80

aspect.name: Stop and Sh2
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, caution
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged left diagonally

aspect.name: Sh2
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, caution
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged left diagonally

aspect.name: Stop and Sh3
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, check
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged right diagonally
aspect.comment: Movement allowed, check points and clearence

aspect.name: Sh3
aspect.indication: Movement allowed, check
aspect.description: Two white lights arranged right diagonally
aspect.comment: Movement allowed, check points and clearence
